text: Hey <@U02PN2K9YD7> , as far as i remember you would need to add HubSpot tracking script to your website and you can also send HubSpotutk with the form submission, that should do the job.

you would be able to track all the activities of the user using script like what pages user visited etc.

for the button purpose i am not sure but you could use the HubSpot form i think

Hi, I wonder if we can add a form submission preview confirmation pop-up window when a contact clicks submit and then add another button inside the pop-up that actually submits the data once it’s been reviewed.

Has any of you worked on something similar?
